Package ss.pentago.network.client

Interface ClientListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextDisplay
    public interface ClientListener
    The listener interface for receiving "interesting" client events, such as a message, a move, etc.
    The class that is interested in processing a client event implements this interface.
    The listener object created from that class is then registered with the Client using the Client's addClientListener method. A client event is generated when the client receives a message from the server. When a client event occurs, the relevant method in the listener object is invoked, and the client event is passed to it.
